attributes.action: Ban all fireworks for good for the sake of the animals that are terrified
attributes.additional_details: The reason for this is not only are they dangerous I have to animals who are terrified and I can imagine I am not the only one they shake and cry its hard to watch and not be able to do anything there has been cruelty towards animals regarding fireworks I find it cruel to put our pets through it
attributes.background: I would like fireworks to be banned for good

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448

Limit the Sale and Use of Fireworks to Organisers of Licensed Displays Only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
